text: I'm glad to see a few #indieweb people building on OPML. There's a lot you can do with it. For example, the native file format of "LO2" is OPML. So it's really good for editing subscription lists for feed readers. And editing blogrolls. My listicle tool takes OPML files as input. And River6, coming soon, does a bunch with OPML. There's also "feedbase" which will blow your mind if you love sharing subscription lists. Yes there's a lot to discover in OPML-land and more on the way. :boom:
